akn:section.akn:heading: Exemption from recordation and transfer tax.

akn:content.akn:p: No right or duty in favor of or against a person having a third-party right of enforcement arises under a conservation easement before its acceptance by the holder and a recordation of the acceptance.
Except as provided in ยง 42-203(b), a conservation easement is unlimited in duration unless the instrument creating it otherwise provides.

An interest in real property in existence at the time a conservation easement is created is not impaired by it unless the owner of the interest is a party to the conservation easement or consents to it.
